channel.title: woodland on Plum Site
channel.description: Recent content in woodland on Plum Site

item.title: Establishing Walnut and Connecting Woodland
item.description: Objectives # To find suitable sites within the Snowdonia National Park for provenance trials with walnut trees. The trees are to be grown for timber and fruit and contribute to sustainable and biodiverse land use systems with structured woodland corridors. Introduction, Land-use Diversification, Wales # UK farming is experiencing problems of economics and sustainability. This includes ‘less favoured’ areas, which cover much of Wales. Less favoured areas are over 240 metres, a category of hills and uplands which are less suitable for arable farming and prime pasture.
